message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper discusses planning under uncertainty for robotic tasks, which is a core topic in robotics (cs.RO). The paper also introduces a subclass of POMDPs and develops a model-based Bayesian reinforcement learning algorithm to solve them, which falls under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of POMDP-lite models for control and decision-making, which is related to control systems (cs.SY) and optimization (cs.MA).
